title: DocuSign Stock Plunges on Soft Outlook
sub_head: The company posted weaker-than-expected revenue outlook for the full year
body:
Shares of DocuSign Inc. fell almost 20% in premarket trading, wiping out the stockâ€™s pandemic-era gains, after the e-signature software maker released softer-than-expected guidance for its fiscal 2023.
The company said Thursday evening that it expects full-year revenue to be between $2.47 billion to $2.48 billion, lower than the $2.61 billion that analysts surveyed by FactSet had been expecting.
